name: website-design
description: Website design for the University of Alabama at Birmingham's Department of Information Technology

scripts.js:concat: concat -o dist/it_group.js src/js/interactive-cards.js src/js/vendor/sidebar.js src/js/vendor/toc.js src/js/twitter-timeline.js src/js/google-sheet.js src/js/search-list.js src/js/vendor/lazy-load.js src/js/vendor/enllax.js
scripts.build: npm run css:prod && npm run js:concat
